app/(admin)/admin/ai/page.tsx.description: AI token management page for Super Admin. Shows organization AI status, plan AI features, toggle AI access via overrides, and adjust quotas. Follows admin page patterns with Card, Modal, Button components and Turkish UI.

app/page.tsx.description: Awwwards-level landing page with hero section (animated gradient orbs, phone mockup), stats, features grid, how-it-works steps, testimonials, pricing preview, and footer. Turkish localized. Uses CSS animations from globals.css (blob, float, fadeIn, scrollDown). Server Component - no 'use client' directive.

app/pricing/page.tsx.description: Comprehensive pricing page with plan comparison table. Follows awwwards-level design pattern with Navigation/Footer components, 4 plans (Lite, Gold, Platinum, Enterprise), detailed feature comparison table organized by categories, FAQ section, and CTA. Uses Turkish localization, primary/secondary color scheme, and responsive design.

app/(dashboard)/layout.tsx.description: Dashboard and admin layouts use server component wrappers with 'dynamic = force-dynamic' to prevent static generation issues. AuthProvider is added at the route group level, not root layout.
